name: The Intern (RyanBurger)
description:
This is my first attempt at making a game. It's pretty simple, you're given tasks, you complete the tasks and gain reputation, and your goal is to get 150 reputation as fast as possible.

Bug Fix 1.1

-Fixed items falling out of the map (they will respawn on the desk)

-Pretty sure items not being able to be picked up is fixed
